Achievements.Name: Passing Wizard
Achievements.Description: Have one player get 3 assists in Rookie Mode in a game

Achievements.Name: Hat Trick in Rookie Mode
Achievements.Description: Have a player get 3 goals in Rookie Mode in a game

Achievements.Name: Powerplay Mastery
Achievements.Description: Score 2 goals on the Powerplay with the same player in Pro Mode

Achievements.Name: Dangerous on the PK
Achievements.Description: Score a short handed goal in Pro Mode

Achievements.Name: Score a goal in All Star Mode
Achievements.Description: Score a goal in All Star Mode

Achievements.Name: Powerplay Quarterback
Achievements.Description: Score a goal on the powerplay with a defenseman in All Star Mode

Achievements.Name: Score a goal in Superstar Mode
Achievements.Description: Score a goal in Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Hat Trick in Superstar Mode
Achievements.Description: Have a player get 3 goals in Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Shutout in Superstar Mode
Achievements.Description: Get a shutout in Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Player scores 5 goals
Achievements.Description: Score 5 goals in a game with one player

Achievements.Name: Victory in Rookie Mode
Achievements.Description: Win a game in Rookie Mode vs. the CPU

Achievements.Name: Victory in Pro Mode
Achievements.Description: Win a game in Pro Mode vs. the CPU

Achievements.Name: Victory in All Star Mode
Achievements.Description: Win a game in All Star mode vs. the CPU

Achievements.Name: Victory in Superstar Mode
Achievements.Description: Win a game in Superstar mode vs. the CPU

Achievements.Name: Complete a ranked online game
Achievements.Description: Play and Complete an Online ranked game

Achievements.Name: Tournament Champion
Achievements.Description: Win a tournament with a minimum of 3 games played in All Star mode

Achievements.Name: Shootout Winner
Achievements.Description: Win a game in shootout mode

Achievements.Name: Shootout Perfection
Achievements.Description: Win a shootout 2-0 without taking the third shot in the shootout

Achievements.Name: Finish a season in Dynasty Mode
Achievements.Description: Complete a season in Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: Earn 100 pts in a season
Achievements.Description: Your team must earn 100 points in a season in Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: Win the President's Trophy
Achievements.Description: Come in first place overall during a season in Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: Stanley Cup Champions
Achievements.Description: Win the Stanley Cup.  A minimum of 10 games must be played during the playoffs

Achievements.Name: Complete Dynasty Mode
Achievements.Description: Complete all 10 years of Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: MVP
Achievements.Description: Have a player on your team win Most Valuable Player during a season in Dynasty Mode™

Achievements.Name: Playoff MVP
Achievements.Description: Have a player on your team win the Conn Smythe Trophy as Most Valuable Player during the playoffs

Achievements.Name: 10 game winning streak
Achievements.Description: Win 10 games in a row in Dynasty Mode
